news_header: Amazon is set to report Q4 2024 earnings on February 6, 2025, with positive growth expectations and strong performance indicators.
news_original_title: Buy Amazon Ahead of Earnings Today on Strong EPS Estimate Revisions
news_text: Amazon.com Inc. is scheduled to announce its fourth-quarter 2024 earnings on February 6, 2025. The company holds a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy) and has an Earnings ESP of +4.78%. With a strong Prime service and AWS cloud dominance, Amazon's revenues are expected to grow by 10.2% year-over-year, reaching $187.28 billion, with an EPS increase of 50.5%. The company has consistently reported positive earnings surprises, and its long-term EPS growth rate is significantly higher than the S&P 500 average.
